overview:
Rich experience in turning digital ideas to a WORKING BUSINESS. Responsible for products execution in the fields of Social Networks, Real-Time platforms (On-Line Video, content collaboration), mobile apps for both business and consumer markets, Location-Based apps (GPS), content for operator’s mobile portals, and more…

Holds 10 years of diverse experience in Marketing, Sales, Business Development and Product Management, in the industries of Mobile & Web. Latest positions: VP Marketing & Sales at the multimedia company YKM, Senior Marketing Director at Logia Mobile / Volas Entertainment, Manager of Mobile Applications and Content at Mirs Communications (Motorola Inc.). Specializes in Products Developing & Marketing, in the fields of New Media, Digital Content & Applications and mobile portals.

Main Expertise:

> Digital products Innovation > Mobile Content Monetizing > Strategic Marketing & Corporate Communications > Business Development (mainly in Europe & Israel)

relationships.title: Director of Marketing and Business Development

milestones.description: VP Marketing & Sales at YKM Multimedia
Director of Marketing at Logia Group
